story: Samir Aly shared GESR's event to the group: Egyptian Geeks.

24.name: Take Your Innovation To The Market!

name: Take Your Innovation To The Market!
caption: Take Your Innovation To The Market!
description:
GESR business incubator first networking event
http://gesr.net/en/take-your-innovation-market

Through years, the word “Innovation” could not be uniformly defined. Yet, one of the most accurate definitions of “Innovation” is: an original idea that has value. As the value of an idea can only be measured by the acceptance of the community and by its impact, we find it mandatory that Innovations should belong to the market, where it can be tested and its true value and impact can be measured. For that purpose, “Take your Innovation to the Market” event was created.

Take your Innovation to the Market, is an event organized by GESR with the aim of bringing together the innovators form all disciplines, and from both business and academia, to come together and to use the power and the value of innovation as a way to solve Egypt social challenges.

Details & Registration: http://gesr.net/en/take-your-innovation-market
